item.title: [khc] Ghostly Flicker
item.description:
Instant

Exile two target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under your control.

item.title: [khc] Sea Gate Oracle
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

item.title: [khc] Synthetic Destiny
item.description:
Instant

Exile all creatures you control. At the beginning of the next end step, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal that many creature cards, put all creature cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.

item.title: [khc] Windfall
item.description:
Sorcery

Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.

item.title: [khc] Whirler Rogue
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue Artificer

When Whirler Rogue enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

item.title: [khc] Ambition's Cost
item.description:
Sorcery

You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

item.title: [khc] Eyeblight Cullers
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

When Eyeblight Cullers dies, create three 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens, then mill three cards. (Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)

item.title: [khc] Lys Alana Scarblade
item.description:
Creature — Elf Assassin

{T}, Discard an Elf card: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves you control.

item.title: [khc] Eyeblight Massacre
item.description:
Sorcery

Non-Elf creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

item.title: [khc] Miara, Thorn of the Glade
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Scout

Whenever Miara, Thorn of the Glade or another Elf you control dies, you may pay {1} and 1 life. If you do, draw a card.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

item.title: [khc] Prowess of the Fair
item.description:
Tribal Enchantment — Elf

Whenever another nontoken Elf is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

item.title: [khc] Pride of the Perfect
item.description:
Enchantment

Elves you control get +2/+0.

item.title: [khc] Beast Whisperer
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.

item.title: [khc] Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Warrior

Reach

Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.

Whenever Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen attacks, you gain 1 life for each attacking Elf you control.

item.title: [khc] Cultivator of Blades
item.description:
Creature — Elf Artificer

Fabricate 2 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.)

Whenever Cultivator of Blades attacks, you may have other attacking creatures get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Cultivator of Blades's power.

item.title: [khc] Elvish Promenade
item.description:
Tribal Sorcery — Elf

Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token for each Elf you control.

item.title: [khc] Elvish Mystic
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

{T}: Add {G}.

item.title: [khc] Elvish Archdruid
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.

{T}: Add {G} for each Elf you control.

item.title: [khc] Farhaven Elf
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

When Farhaven Elf enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [khc] End-Raze Forerunners
item.description:
Creature — Boar

Vigilance, trample, haste

When End-Raze Forerunners enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance and trample until end of turn.

item.title: [khc] Elvish Rejuvenator
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

When Elvish Rejuvenator enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [khc] Harvest Season
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the number of tapped creatures you control, and put those cards onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [khc] Lys Alana Huntmaster
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

item.title: [khc] Llanowar Tribe
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

{T}: Add {G}{G}{G}.

item.title: [khc] Jagged-Scar Archers
item.description:
Creature — Elf Archer

Jagged-Scar Archers's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves you control.

{T}: Jagged-Scar Archers deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.

item.title: [khc] Imperious Perfect
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

Other Elves you control get +1/+1.

{G}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

item.title: [khc] Masked Admirers
item.description:
Creature — Elf Shaman

When Masked Admirers enters the battlefield, draw a card.

Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {G}{G}. If you do, return Masked Admirers from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [khc] Marwyn, the Nurturer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Druid

Whenever another Elf enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Marwyn, the Nurturer.

{T}: Add an amount of {G} equal to Marwyn's power.

item.title: [khc] Nullmage Shepherd
item.description:
Creature — Elf Shaman

Tap four untapped creatures you control: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [khc] Reclamation Sage
item.description:
Creature — Elf Shaman

When Reclamation Sage enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [khc] Numa, Joraga Chieftain
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Warrior

At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {X}{X}. When you do, distribute X +1/+1 counters among any number of target Elves.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

item.title: [khc] Sylvan Messenger
item.description:
Creature — Elf

Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.title: [khc] Springbloom Druid
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

When Springbloom Druid enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [khc] Rhys the Exiled
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Warrior

Whenever Rhys the Exiled attacks, you gain 1 life for each Elf you control.

{B}, Sacrifice an Elf: Regenerate Rhys the Exiled.

item.title: [khc] Voice of the Woods
item.description:
Creature — Elf

Tap five untapped Elves you control: Create a 7/7 green Elemental creature token with trample.

item.title: [khc] Voice of Many
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

When Voice of Many enters the battlefield, draw a card for each opponent who controls fewer creatures than you.

item.title: [khc] Timberwatch Elf
item.description:
Creature — Elf

{T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.

item.title: [khc] Wirewood Channeler
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

{T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.

item.title: [khc] Wood Elves
item.description:
Creature — Elf Scout

When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [khc] Casualties of War
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one or more —

• Destroy target artifact.

• Destroy target creature.

• Destroy target enchantment.

• Destroy target land.

• Destroy target planeswalker.

item.title: [khc] Brago, King Eternal
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit Noble

Flying

Whenever Brago, King Eternal deals combat damage to a player, exile any number of target nonland permanents you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

item.title: [khc] Abomination of Llanowar
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Horror

Vigilance; menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

Abomination of Llanowar's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves you control plus the number of Elf cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [khc] Cloudblazer
item.description:
Creature — Human Scout

Flying

When Cloudblazer enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and draw two cards.

item.title: [khc] Empyrean Eagle
item.description:
Creature — Bird Spirit

Flying

Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

item.title: [khc] Mistmeadow Witch
item.description:
Creature — Kithkin Wizard

{2}{W}{U}: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [khc] Migratory Route
item.description:
Sorcery

Create four 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying.

Basic landcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

item.title: [khc] Golgari Findbroker
item.description:
Creature — Elf Shaman

When Golgari Findbroker enters the battlefield, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [khc] Putrefy
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.

item.title: [khc] Poison-Tip Archer
item.description:
Creature — Elf Archer

Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

Whenever another creature dies, each opponent loses 1 life.

item.title: [khc] Moldervine Reclamation
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature you control dies, you gain 1 life and draw a card.
